summary: This bill, the Small Business Tax Fairness and Compliance Simplification Act, amends the Internal Revenue Code to address tax compliance and reporting in the beauty service industry. It extends the employer tip credit to beauty service businesses, defines "beauty service," and establishes a safe harbor for employer tip reporting compliance. Additionally, it mandates information reporting for rentals of space in the beauty service industry. These changes aim to simplify tax regulations and encourage compliance within the beauty sector.
